text: I wasn't planning to make this video
until today I tried to give the people
here another chance but after a
situation yesterday where I got a door
slammed on me this issue needs to be
brought up why are New Yorkers so rude
is it the bad weather is it in their
blood to not say please or thank you to
not open the door for you to honestly
not give a about you and thus you
are making their bank account increase I
come to the city several times a year
and I still wonder why 9 out of 10
people will not smile back at me
seriously everyone feels like they're in
their own world they have music in their
ears they're on their phones they walk
fast or walk their dogs or bike they
zone out especially on the subway if I
lived here I couldn't imagine how hard
it'd be to make new friends everyone
seems to hang out in their own cliques
whether it's with their colleagues
classmates sports mates or childhood
friends what do you want do you alright
in any regard I'm not trying to hate on
New York City I really do love it here
the unfriendly people is what gives this
city character it's what makes it so
unique New York is the place to be for
business to diversify your mind to learn
about yourself at any stage in life to
grow and evolve but to be honest it'd be
a little more enjoyable if people were
friendlier what do you guys think am I
crazy for making this argument
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
